Rules.InvariantScript:
If(
    'Primary Cart'.CartType = "Primary",
    Remove(
        colPrimaryCart,
        ThisItem
    ),
    'Primary Cart'.CartType = "Secondary",
    Remove(
        colSecondaryCart,
        ThisItem
    )
)
LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Medium Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Medium Font Size").'Default Value'
